column1:
Beauty and the Beast is my favorite fairytale, my favorite Disney movie, my favorite movie of all time. I may only have a small collection of Beauty and the Beast merch but I’m always looking for more. I even had to go to the Grand Opening of New Fantasyland because they have a whole section dedicated to Beauty and the Beast. The dress I got for my sister’s wedding was made to look like Belle’s Little Town dress so I could use it for my first Disneybound.
I have been wanting a live-action Beauty and the Beast movie from Disney since forever. And with how much I love Maleficent, I’m gunna die. (I have read and collected so many variations of the Beauty and the Beast story, with that details and storyline variations wouldn’t really be a problem.) It will be so so so amazing for Beauty and the Beast to Finally have some damn attention!!!
If we look at how they’ve treated their more recent movies, esp. Maleficent, I can only imagine that Hottopic will have a fashion line, there will be all sorts of shirts, journals, mugs and dolls - oh the dolls! I Am So Excited. I wasn’t even a thought when Disney’s Beauty and the Beast came out in 1991, and now I get to go through the whole experience of announcement to production to release, etc. I can get all the LE Merch (and just amazing merch) when it actually comes out!! (I won’t have to search ebay and pay way too much -squees-)
And this means, new costumes!!! I’m sure they’ll still have the iconic gold ballgown but hopefully it’ll be closer to the new redesign than the YELLOW Dress in the animated film. I cannot wait to cosplay and dress inspired by.

My only stipulation: he actually be a Beast (of some sort) and she have brown hair.
i’m gonna be 1950s!Belle and literally nobody is gonna stop me

Belle is my favorite disney princess because there is a whole musical number where the entire town basically says “yeah she’s hot, but she fucking weird” and Belle’s just like “hell fucking yeah I’m hot and weird, peace out. kindness bitches” and that’s what I aspire to be like when I grow up
